required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Early Bactericidal Activity in Pulmonary Tuberculosis (TMC207-CL001)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Dose Ranging Trial to Evaluate the Extended Early Bactericidal Activity, Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of TMC207 in Adult Patients With Newly Diagnosed, Uncomplicated, Smear-Positive, Pulmonary Tuberculosis.

lead_sponsor.agency: Global Alliance for TB Drug Development

clinical_study.source: Global Alliance for TB Drug Development

brief_summary.textblock: The trial will evaluate the extended bactericidal activity of 14 consecutive days of oral administration of TMC207 at multiple doses as determined by the rate of change of log10 colony forming units (CFU) per ml sputum over the time period Day 7-14 in participants with smear positive pulmonary tuberculosis (TB). A control group will receive standard treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Early Bactericidal Activity (EBA) Measured as the Mean Rate of Change of log10 Colony Forming Units (CFU) of M. Tuberculosis Per ml Sputum on Solid Medium Over Time (Days 0-14).
primary_outcome.description: The rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group. The nodes (point of inflection, i.e. where slope changes) used in these bi-linear regressions, as determined by visual inspection, were Day 3.5. node. Throughout the analyses, the established node at Day 2.5 was used in the Rifafour e-275 arm. Note that to facilitate interpretation the sign of these slopes were reversed for log10CFU/ml.

secondary_outcome.measure: Early Bactericidal Activity (EBA) Measured as the Mean Rate of Change of log10 Colony Forming Units (CFU) of M. Tuberculosis Per ml Sputum on Solid Medium Over Time (Days 7-14).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 7-14 of fourteen consecutive days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group. The nodes (point of inflection, i.e. where slope changes) used in these bi-linear regressions, as determined by visual inspection, were Day 3.5. node. Throughout the analyses, the established node at Day 2.5 was used in the Rifafour e-275 arm. Since Day 7 is later than the node day, the rate of change for this outcome is equal to the slope at Day 14. Note that to facilitate interpretation the sign of these slopes were reversed for log10CFU/ml.

secondary_outcome.measure: Early Bactericidal Activity (EBA) Measured as the Mean Rate of Change of log10 Colony Forming Units (CFU) of M. Tuberculosis Per ml Sputum on Solid Medium Over Time (Days 2-14).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 2-14 of fourteen consecutive days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group. The nodes (point of inflection, i.e. where slope changes) used in these bi-linear regressions, as determined by visual inspection, were Day 3.5. node. Throughout the analyses, the established node at Day 2.5 was used in the Rifafour e-275 arm. Note that to facilitate interpretation the sign of these slopes were reversed for log10CFU/ml.

secondary_outcome.measure: Early Bactericidal Activity (EBA) Measured as the Mean Rate of Change of log10 Colony Forming Units (CFU) of M. Tuberculosis Per ml Sputum on Solid Medium Over Time (Days 0-2).
secondary_outcome.description: The rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group. The nodes (point of inflection, i.e. where slope changes) used in these bi-linear regressions, as determined by visual inspection, were Day 3.5. node. Throughout the analyses, the established node at Day 2.5 was used in the Rifafour e-275 arm. Since this range (Days0-2) is before the node day, the rate of change for this outcome is equal to the slope at Day 0. Note that to facilitate interpretation the sign of these slopes were reversed for log10CFU/ml.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Change in Time to Sputum Culture Positivity (TTP)(Hours) in Liquid Culture Media (Days 0-14)
secondary_outcome.description: The TTP was measured in the Mycobacterial Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) (Bactec MGIT960) automated liquid culture system from overnight sputum. TTP rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Change in Time to Sputum Culture Positivity (TTP)(Hours) in Liquid Culture Media (Days 0-2)
secondary_outcome.description: The TTP was measured in the Mycobacterial Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) (Bactec MGIT960) automated liquid culture system from overnight sputum. TTP rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Change in Time to Sputum Culture Positivity (TTP)(Hours) in Liquid Culture Media (Days 2-14)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 2-14 of fourteen consecutive days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The TTP was measured in the Mycobacterial Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) (Bactec MGIT960) automated liquid culture system from overnight sputum. TTP rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Change in Time to Sputum Culture Positivity (TTP)(Hours) in Liquid Culture Media (Days 7-14)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 7-14 of fourteen consecutive days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The TTP was measured in the Mycobacterial Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) (Bactec MGIT960) automated liquid culture system from overnight sputum. TTP rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Summary of Statistical Analysis of TMC207 Maximum Plasma Concentration Following Dosing (C(Max)) on Days 1 and 14
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 12, and 24 hour post-dose) or Day 14 (0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, and 30 hour post-dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: Summary of Statistical Analysis of TMC207 Time of Maximum Plasma Concentration (T(Max)) on Days 1 and 14
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 12, and 24 hour post-dose) or Day 14 (0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, and 30 hour post-dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: Summary of Statistical Analysis of TMC207 Area Under the Concentration-time Curve Over the Dose Interval of 0 to 24 h (AUC(0-24)) on Day 1 and Day 14
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 12, and 24 hour post-dose) or Day 14 (0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 12, and 24 hour post-dose)

arm_group.description: TMC207- 700 mg Day 1; 500 mg Day 2; 400 mg Days 3-14
TMC207- 500 mg Day 1; 400 mg Day 2 and 300 mg Days 3-14.
TMC207- 400 mg Day 1; 300 mg Day 2 and 200 mg Days 3-14
TMC207- 200 mg Day 1 and 100 mg Days 2-14

overall_official.affiliation: TASK APPLIED SCIENCE, Karl Bremer Hospital

Sex: Female, Male

outcome.title: Early Bactericidal Activity (EBA) Measured as the Mean Rate of Change of log10 Colony Forming Units (CFU) of M. Tuberculosis Per ml Sputum on Solid Medium Over Time (Days 0-14).
outcome.description: The rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group. The nodes (point of inflection, i.e. where slope changes) used in these bi-linear regressions, as determined by visual inspection, were Day 3.5. node. Throughout the analyses, the established node at Day 2.5 was used in the Rifafour e-275 arm. Note that to facilitate interpretation the sign of these slopes were reversed for log10CFU/ml.
outcome.population: Because of insufficient data for bilinear regression, four patients were omitted from EBA(CFU) calculations.

outcome.title: Rate of Change in Time to Sputum Culture Positivity (TTP)(Hours) in Liquid Culture Media (Days 0-14)
outcome.description: The TTP was measured in the Mycobacterial Growth Indicator Tube (MGIT) (Bactec MGIT960) automated liquid culture system from overnight sputum. TTP rates of change were calculated from the two slopes of the bi-linear (piece-wise) regression, for each treatment group.
outcome.population: Because of insufficient data for bilinear regression, nine participants were omitted from TTP calculations.

reported_events.desc: Adverse events were collected by the Investigator from the time a participant signed the Informed Consent Form until the end of follow-up visit (Day 49). Data reported are treatment-emergent adverse events.

group.description: Daily Doses: 30 to 37 kg, 2 tablets; 38 to 54 kg, 3 tablets; 55 to 70 kg, 4 tablets; 71 kg and over, 5 tablets

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The investigator or any Sub-Investigator shall submit any oral or written publication or abstract concerning this study to the Sponsor not less than thirty (30) days prior to submission to any journal, other publication or meeting, for review and removal of confidential information.
